A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Unique\, Flawed\, But needed.\nThese three terms describe all my feelings towards The Last Jedi\, I personally loved the movie and would recommend anyone to see it\, I can see however all the criticism it is getting\, but people have to understand that the movie is supposed to show failure\, conflict and consequence\, most fans are too narrow minded to see these themes sadly\, I hope the storm subsides and people can see the movie for what is is.
